mapper.insert: insert into ( user_id, mobile_num, mail, create_time, update_time, full_name, sex, age, id_num ) values ( #{mobileNum,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INT}, #{age,jdbcType=INT}, #{idNum,jdbcType=CHAR} )
